Package Branch_And_Bound_TSP

Class Template_BnB_TSP

java.lang.Object
Branch_And_Bound_TSP.Template_BnB_TSP
All Implemented Interfaces:
BnB_TSP
Direct Known Subclasses:
BnB_TSP1, BnB_TSP2
public abstract class Template_BnB_TSP
extends java.lang.Object
implements BnB_TSP
Template of a class that solves the Pickup/Delivery TSP problem using the Branch And Bound paradigm. Inheritors may override functions to implement heuristics that accelerate computing.
See Also:
BnB_TSP

  • Method Details

    • searchSolution

      public void searchSolution​(int timeLimit, SuperArete[][] matAdj, java.util.ArrayList<Request> listeRequetes)
      Start the computation for a given instance of the problem. After running this method, the solution can be obtained using getSolution().
      Specified by:
      searchSolution in interface BnB_TSP
      Parameters:
      timeLimit - The execution duration after which computing will automatically be stopped, in milliseconds
      matAdj - The optimal full sub-graph of the map as an adjacence matrix
      listeRequetes - A list of Requests to deal with

    • getSolution

      public java.lang.Integer[] getSolution()
      Specified by:

      public float getExecTime()
      Specified by:

    • setIndexDico

      public void setIndexDico()

    • bound

      protected abstract float bound​(java.lang.Integer currentVertex, java.util.ArrayList<TupleRequete> requetes)
      Computes a lower bound of the length of the path left to travel to complete all remaining Requests. Method that must be defined in TemplateTSP subclasses.
      Parameters:
      currentVertex - The index of the current node (interest point)
      requetes - The list of Requests left to deal with
      Returns:
      a lower bound of the cost of paths in matAdj starting from currentVertex, visiting every interest point in requetes, and returning back to vertex 0.

    • iterator

      protected abstract java.util.Iterator<java.lang.Integer> iterator​(java.lang.Integer currentVertex, java.util.Collection<TupleRequete> unvisited, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Long,​java.lang.Integer> ptsIdToIndex, SuperArete[][] matAdj)
      Creates an iterator that scrolls through all remaining interest points. Method that must be defined in TemplateTSP subclasses.
      Parameters:
      currentVertex - The index of the current node (interest point)
      unvisited - The unordered list of nodes (interest points) that must still be visited
      ptsIdToIndex - The dictionnary associating and Intersection ID with its index in the adjacence matrix
      matAdj - The optimal full sub-graph of the map as an adjacence matrix
      Returns:
      an iterator for visiting all remaining interest points in requetes.

    • branchAndBound

      private void branchAndBound​(int currentVertex, int leftTodo, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> visited, float currentCost, java.util.ArrayList<TupleRequete> requetes)
      Template method of a branch and bound algorithm for solving the TSP in matAdj. Recursive method, building paths with each iteration.
      Parameters:
      currentVertex - The index of the current node (interest point)
      leftTodo - the number of vertices that have not yet been visited
      visited - the sequence of vertices that have been already visited (including currentVertex)
      currentCost - the cost of the path corresponding to visited
      requetes - The list of Requests left to deal with
